intro.title: Get In Touch
intro.subtitle: Ready to start your project?
intro.description: I'm always excited to work on new projects and help businesses achieve their digital goals. Whether you need a new website, AI automation, or strategic consulting, I'm here to help.

form.title: Project Brief
form.subtitle: Tell me about your project

message.label: Project Details
message.placeholder: Tell me about your project, goals, and any specific requirements...

form.success: Thank you! I'll get back to you within 24 hours.
form.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.

email.label: Email
email.description: For project inquiries and general questions

response.label: Response Time
response.description: I typically respond to all inquiries within one business day

timeline.question: How long does a typical project take?
timeline.answer: Project timelines vary based on complexity and scope. A simple website might take 2-4 weeks, while a comprehensive platform could take 2-6 months. I'll provide a detailed timeline during our initial consultation.

pricing.question: What are your rates?
pricing.answer: I provide custom quotes based on project requirements. Factors include complexity, timeline, and specific features needed. Contact me for a detailed estimate tailored to your project.

process.question: What's your development process?
process.answer: I follow a structured approach: Discovery & Planning, Design & Prototyping, Development & Testing, and Launch & Support. Each phase includes regular check-ins and feedback sessions.

support.question: Do you provide ongoing support?
support.answer: Yes! I offer ongoing maintenance, updates, and support packages to ensure your project continues to perform optimally after launch.

technologies.question: What technologies do you work with?
technologies.answer: I work with modern web technologies including React, Next.js, TypeScript, Node.js, Python, and various AI/ML frameworks. I choose the best tools for each specific project.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Digital Presence?
cta.description: Join the growing list of businesses and creators who've elevated their digital presence with cutting-edge design, development, and AI integration.
